author: James B. Allen "Jim"

review: Just replaced all of my AppleTV's with FireTV's (2 FireTV's, 1 FireTV stick). No comparison. Streaming performance is great, interface is so much snappier and easier to navigate (once you get used to it), and there are many more apps. Also, since I get all of my music from Amazon, my entire music library is already on there. No need to have a computer running in the background. Only thing I miss is airplay, but there are apps for that.
author: Alex Guichard

review: Makes your search super fast with its quad processor. I love it, but there is the CAUTION if you don't notice the charges for certain programs. It improves your viewing pleasure if you already subscribe to programs like Netflix, Hulu plus, etc. My thought is that the charge amount be made twice as large so I don't have a surprise at the end of the month and don't allow your kids free reign on the gadget. It is easy to set up and run. I thought there weren't enough instructions, until I realized, it really is a no brainer.
